item.title: Tech wrap Jan 10: Xiaomi Pad 7 launch, OnePlus 13 sale, DailyObjects LOOP - Business Standard
item.description:
Tech wrap Jan 10: Xiaomi Pad 7 launch, OnePlus 13 sale, DailyObjects LOOP

Publication Date: January 10, 2023

Source: Unknown

This article covers the latest tech news including the launch of the Xiaomi Pad 7 and OnePlus 13 in India and new products from DailyObjects.

  • Xiaomi Pad 7: Features Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Plus Gen 3, available with a Nano Texture Display and runs on HyperOS 2.
  • OnePlus 13: Launched on January 7, powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite, equipped with Hasselblad camera, running Oxygen OS 15.
  • DailyObjects LOOP: New series of MagSafe-compatible power banks, Qi2-certified, with 15W wireless charging.
  • Redmi 14C 5G: Up for sale in India starting at Rs 9,999, featuring dual 5G support and premium design.
  • Google AI Podcast: Testing personalized daily podcasts feature called Daily Listen.
  • Meta's Content Moderation Changes: Increased searches on deleting accounts following changes in moderation policy.
  • Meta Discontinuation: Ending third-party fact-checking in the US, shifting to user-generated Community Notes.

item.title: OnePlus 13 series is now available for purchase: Price in India, offers and more - The Times of India
item.description:
OnePlus 13 series is now available for purchase: Price in India, offers and more

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Tech News

The OnePlus 13 series has officially launched in India, offering new models with enhanced features and attractive pricing. Customers can benefit from various promotional offers upon purchase.

  • Multiple models available, including the OnePlus 13 Pro.
  • Competitive pricing aimed at capturing the mid-range smartphone market.
  • Special offers available through select retailers and online platforms.
“This series represents our commitment to innovation and value for money,” said a company spokesperson.

The launch of the OnePlus 13 series marks an important milestone for the brand, as it competes in a crowded smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series full specs leaked ahead of January 22 Unpacked event: Details - The Financial Express
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Full Specs Leaked Ahead of January 22 Unpacked Event

Publication Date: January 15, 2024

Source: Financial Express

The Galaxy S25 series is set for launch soon, and leaks reveal detailed specifications for the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra models, including their display, performance, and camera features.

Key Points

  • The Galaxy S25 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with Full HD+ (2340 x 1080) resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • It is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset with 12GB of RAM and storage options of 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB.
  • Camera setup includes a 50MP primary, 12MP ultrawide, and 10MP telephoto lens with OIS.
  • Battery capacity stands at 4,000mAh with 25W wired fast charging and wireless charging support.
  • The Galaxy S25+ has a larger screen at 6.7 inches, WQHD resolution, a bigger 4,900mAh battery, and similar camera specifications.
  • The flagship Galaxy S25 Ultra includes a 6.9-inch display, advanced 200MP camera, and a capacity of up to 1TB storage.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

The S25 Ultra model features the highest level of detail and color accuracy with its massive 6.9-inch display and exceptional camera capabilities.

The phone runs on Android 15 with Samsung’s One UI 7 for a user-friendly experience.

item.title: OnePlus 13R Review: A well-rounded, affordable flagship that’s high on performance - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13R Review: A well-rounded, affordable flagship that’s high on performance

Publication Date: January 10, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

The OnePlus 13R is a new budget-friendly flagship smartphone from OnePlus, aimed at delivering high performance without breaking the bank. This review shares insights into its design, display, camera capabilities, and overall performance based on hands-on experience.

Key Points:

  • Top-notch specifications at a lower price compared to OnePlus 13.
  • Features a 6.78-inch ProXDR flat display with 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and a 6000mAh battery for extensive usage.
  • Camera includes a 50 MP primary sensor, alongside ultra-wide and portrait lenses.
  • Offers a lightweight design and a premium finish.

Notable Quotes:

“The OnePlus 13R strikes a balance between performance, design, and affordability.”
“It’s lightweight, has a premium finish, and is an overall compelling choice for everyday usability.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13R is a well-rounded smartphone offering a blend of performance and affordability, ideal for users seeking flagship features without the premium price tag.

item.title: S Pen in Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra to lose Bluetooth functionality - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra S Pen Loses Bluetooth Functionality

Publication Date: Two weeks from now
Source: Leakster Ishan Agarwal

Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 series in two weeks. The Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring rounded corners and a built-in S Pen, seems to be losing its Bluetooth functionality.

  • The S Pen will forfeit Bluetooth capabilities, eliminating features like gestures and remote control.
  • Current Bluetooth functions include taking photos, switching cameras, and changing photo modes via gestures.
  • The feature set, known as Air Actions, will no longer be available in the S Pen for the Galaxy S25 Ultra.
  • This change may discourage some users from upgrading to the new series.
"Eliminating remote control features seems like a step back."

This decision by Samsung may point to design changes that accommodate a subtly smaller stylus fitting into the device.

item.title: Elon Musk’s GrokAI chatbot gets a dedicated app: How to access and more - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Elon Musk’s GrokAI chatbot gets a dedicated app: How to access and more

Date: January 10, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Grok, the AI assistant integrated into the X social media platform, is now available as a standalone application for iPhones, offering real-time information, image generation, and more, making it accessible to a variety of users.

  • GrokAI is now a standalone app available for iPhone users.
  • The app offers capabilities such as real-time information retrieval and image generation.
  • This launch expands the accessibility of GrokAI beyond the X platform.
“Grok, the AI assistant integrated into the X social media platform, is now available as a standalone application”

The launch of GrokAI as a dedicated app marks a notable expansion in how users can access AI technology.

item.title: Buying NVIDIA RTX 50 Series GPU? Here's the pricing for the RTX 5070, 5070 Ti, 5080, and 5090 in India | Mint - Mint
item.description:
NVIDIA RTX 50 Series GPU Pricing Revealed in India

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Live Mint

At CES 2025, Nvidia unveiled its latest 50 series GPUs, known as the Blackwell GPUs, featuring four new models with significantly improved performance over the previous generation.

NVIDIA RTX 50 Series Price And Availability In India

  • RTX 5070: ₹59,000
  • RTX 5070 Ti: ₹80,000
  • RTX 5080: ₹1,07,000
  • RTX 5090: ₹2,14,000

Availability for RTX 5090 and RTX 5080 starts on January 30, while RTX 5070 Ti and RTX 5070 will be released in February.

All GPUs feature DLSS 4 compatibility and GDDR7 memory.

  • RTX 5070: 12 GB GDDR7, 6,144 CUDA cores, TDP 250 watts.
  • RTX 5070 Ti: 16 GB GDDR7, 8,960 CUDA cores, TDP 300 watts.
  • RTX 5080: 16 GB GDDR7, 10,752 CUDA cores, TDP 360 watts.
  • RTX 5090: 32 GB GDDR7, 21,760 CUDA cores, TDP 575 watts.

item.title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price and key details leaked ahead of the launch event - HT Tech
item.description:
Samsung Unpacked 2025: Key Details and Price Leak for Galaxy S25 Series

Publication Date: January 22, 2025

Source: Tech Hindustan Times

Samsung has announced that its Galaxy Unpacked event will unveil the flagship Galaxy S25 series, with leaked pricing and features surfacing ahead of the launch.

Pricing Details

  • The Galaxy S25 starts at 964 euros (~Rs. 85,000) for the base model.
  • The Galaxy S25+ is expected to start at 1,235 euros (~Rs. 1,09,000).
  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra pricing starts at 1,557 euros (~Rs. 1,38,000).

Storage and Color Options

  • Galaxy S25 available in 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB.
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra could feature up to 1TB of storage.
  • Color options include icy blue, mint, navy, and silver for S25 and S25+, and titanium variants for S25 Ultra.

Pre-Reservations

Pre-reservations for the Galaxy S25 series are available in India with benefits worth Rs. 5,000.

“The new OneUI7 interface will likely be introduced alongside the Galaxy S25 series.”

As anticipation builds for the Galaxy Unpacked event, the S25 series promises appealing choices for consumers.

item.title: Xiaomi Redmi 14C smartphone goes on sale: Price, offers, and more - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Xiaomi Redmi 14C smartphone goes on sale: Price, offers, and more

Date: January 10, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The Xiaomi Redmi 14C 5G is now on sale in India starting at Rs 9,999. It features impressive specifications, appealing to a wide range of consumers.

  • Available on Mi.com, Flipkart, Amazon, and authorized retail stores.
  • Starting price: Rs 9,999 for the 4GB + 64GB variant.
  • 4GB + 128GB model priced at Rs 10,999, and the 6GB + 128GB option at Rs 11,999.
  • Features a 6.88-inch HD+ display and Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 5G processor.
  • Includes up to 12GB RAM and a 50MP AI dual-camera system.
  • Runs on Xiaomi HyperOS based on Android 14.
  • Available in three color options.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to launch with ultra-thin design and A19 chipset, expected in September 2025 - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air to Launch with Ultra-Thin Design and A19 Chipset, Expected in September 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

Apple's iPhone 17 Air is anticipated to launch in September 2025 as an ultra-thin version of the iPhone, potentially featuring the new A19 chipset.

  • Expected to be ultra-thin at just 6mm thick, making it the slimmest iPhone to date.
  • Possibly priced around USD 899, aiming to replace the iPhone 16 Plus.
  • Will focus on a simplified camera system, likely featuring a single 48-megapixel camera.
  • Rumored to utilize the new A19 chipset, enhancing performance and energy efficiency.
  • May include an upgraded 24-megapixel front camera and 8GB of RAM.
“The iPhone 17 Air promises to deliver an exciting new option for iPhone users who prioritize portability and performance.”

This device is generating considerable buzz among tech enthusiasts due to its innovative features and design intentions.

item.title: Redmi is first to bring the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 to Europe - The Verge
item.description:
Redmi is first to bring the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 to Europe

Publication Date: Today | Source: The Verge

Redmi has now launched its affordable Note 14 series in Europe, featuring the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset, which emphasizes performance for mid-range devices.

  • The Note 14 series includes five models, with the Note 14 Pro Plus 5G being the only one featuring the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3.
  • This 4nm chipset features Arm's v9 architecture and a 2.5GHz Cortex-A720 core.
  • The Note 14 Pro Plus 5G starts at £399/€499.90 and offers high-end specs compared to competitors like Google's Pixel 8A.
  • Other models in the series offer a lower-spec range, with some only featuring 4G support.
  • European models differ from their Asian counterparts in specifications.
“Starting at £399/€499.90, the Pro Plus is positioned as a natural competitor to Google’s Pixel 8A...”

In conclusion, the Redmi Note 14 series aims to fill a budget-friendly niche in the European market with competitive specs, although it faces stiff competition from various Xiaomi models.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 with Qualcomm Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chipset launched in India - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Xiaomi Launches Pad 7 with Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 in India

Published: 10 January 2025, Source: Deccan Herald

Xiaomi has launched its new Pad 7 series in India featuring advanced specifications for a seamless user experience.

  • 11.2-inch 3.2K display with variable refresh rates and HDR capabilities.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor.
  • Available in configurations of 8GB RAM/128GB storage and 12GB RAM/256GB storage.
  • Features quad speakers, an 8,850mAh battery, and multiple camera options.
  • Comes with optional accessories including the Xiaomi Focus Keyboard and Focus Pen.
The Pad 7 offers a nano texture display for enhanced viewability and comes with anti-glare features.

This launch marks Xiaomi's commitment to providing high-end tablet options at competitive prices.

item.title: Redmi 14C budget 5G smartphone goes on sale: Check price, specs and more - Business Standard
item.description:
Redmi 14C Budget 5G Smartphone Launched: Pricing and Features

Date: January 10, 2025, Source: Business Standard

Xiaomi’s Redmi 14C 5G smartphone is officially available in India starting at Rs 9,999. It features the Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and supports dual 5G SIMs.

  • Price: Rs 9,999 for 4GB RAM + 64GB storage
  • Variants: 4GB RAM + 128GB for Rs 10,999, 6GB RAM + 128GB for Rs 11,999
  • Colors: Stardust Purple, Stargaze Black, Starlight Blue
  • Display: 6.88-inch HD+, 120Hz refresh rate
  • Camera: 50MP rear, 8MP front
  • Battery: 5160mAh with 18W charging
“The display is TUV Rheinland-certified for reduced blue light and flicker-free visuals, ensuring eye comfort.”

The Redmi 14C 5G is positioned as an affordable smartphone with attractive specifications, making it appealing for budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: iPhone 16 to get Rs 15,901 discount during Flipkart Republic Day sale - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 16 to get Rs 15,901 discount during Flipkart Republic Day sale

Publication Date: January 2024 Source: India Today

Flipkart has announced a significant discount for the iPhone 16 during the upcoming Republic Day sale, starting January 13, bringing its price down to Rs 63,999.

  • The iPhone 16 was originally launched in India at Rs 79,900.
  • The effective discount during the sale will be Rs 15,901.
  • The final deal may include both flat discounts and bank offers.
  • There could be an exchange bonus discount as part of the offer.
  • Features of the iPhone 16 include the latest A18 chip, a Super Retina XDR OLED display, and a 48MP main camera.
“The iPhone 16 is IP68-rated, offering splash, water, and dust resistance for added durability.”

This exciting discount on the iPhone 16 is expected to attract many customers during the Republic Day sale on Flipkart.

item.title: [CES 2025] Home of the Future: Samsung Redefines the Standard for Smart Home - samsung.com
item.description:
Home of the Future: Samsung Redefines the Standard for Smart Home

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Samsung Newsroom

At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, Samsung Electronics unveiled its vision for the future of smart homes, focusing on AI-driven solutions designed to improve efficiency, wellness, productivity, and art integration within the home.

  • Samsung's booth featured immersive experiences categorized into Home for Efficiency, Home for Wellness, Home for Loved Ones, Home for Productivity, and Home for Art.
  • The Home for Efficiency showcased AI technology to streamline household tasks and energy management.
  • Innovative appliances like the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo™ and Bespoke AI Jet Bot Combo™ were highlighted for their efficiency.
  • The Home for Loved Ones zone introduced AI solutions for caring for family members and pets, including monitoring falls and activity.
  • Productivity tools powered by Galaxy AI were showcased, including features of the soon-to-be-launched Galaxy Book5 Pro.
  • The Home for Art zone featured collaborations with leading art institutions presenting famous artworks through Samsung screens.
“This space is just breathtaking because it’s so immersive,” said Scott Mulkey, an attendee from Dallas, Texas.

Overall, Samsung's exhibit at CES 2025 reflects its commitment to advancing intelligent home solutions to enhance daily living and provide more time for what matters.

item.title: Google tests AI-generated daily podcast with personalised content: Report - Business Standard
item.description:
Google tests AI-generated daily podcast with personalised content: Report

Publication Date: Jan 10 2025 | Source: 9To5Google

Google is reportedly testing a new AI-powered feature called Daily Listen that generates personalised daily podcasts based on users' online interactions. The feature curates five-minute audio tracks using a person's Google Search data and Discover feed interactions.

  • The Daily Listen feature is rolling out on Google's Search Labs platform in the US for both Android and iOS.
  • It frames an audio track that includes topics and stories of interest to the user.
  • A carousel card in the Google app indicates the feature with a 'made for you' badge.
  • The audio player includes playback control options and provides text transcripts.
  • Users can give feedback by rating the generated track.
"The personalised AI-powered audio experiment offers an overview of all the curated topics and allows user interaction for feedback."

This new feature signifies Google's continued innovation in AI and user engagement, enhancing personalized experiences within its app ecosystem.

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Pro Launched: Full Specifications, Price, Features, And More - HerZindagi English
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Pro Launched: Full Specifications, Price, Features, And More

Publication Date: Not Specified | Source: Herzindagi

The Redmi Note 14 Pro features a 50MP camera, a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra processor, and a 5500mAh battery. It is part of Xiaomi's effort to enhance its mid-range smartphone offerings.

  • The smartphone offers two storage configurations: 8GB RAM with 256GB storage and 8GB RAM with 128GB storage, both priced at ₹24,999.
  • Notable discounts available on Flipkart, including an 11% discount on the Pro+ 5G variant.
  • It features a 6.67-inch 1.5K curved OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset with a Mali-G615 MC2 GPU.
  • Houses a robust 5500mAh battery with 45W fast charging technology.
  • The camera setup includes a 50MP primary sensor, an 8MP ultra-wide lens, and a 2MP macro lens, plus a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • Offers additional incentives like 5% unlimited cashback for customers using Flipkart Axis Bank credit cards.
"Introducing the #RedmiNote14 Pro+ 5G, packed with everything you need for an unforgettable experience!" — Xiaomi India

This launch represents Xiaomi's continued commitment to providing value in the mid-range smartphone market.

item.title: How is 5G network different from 5.5G launched by Jio? | 5.5G offers 380% improved speed | Inshorts - Inshorts
item.description:
How is 5G network different from 5.5G launched by Jio?

Date: Friday 10 January, 2025 | Source: Inshorts

Jio and OnePlus have launched 5.5G technology, an advanced version of 5G that offers significantly improved speeds.

  • 5.5G uses Component Carrier Aggregation (3CC) technology to connect to multiple network cells.
  • The peak download speed achieved was 1,014.86 Mbps, compared to 277.78 Mbps for traditional 5G.
  • This advancement ensures faster data transfer for users.
"The 5.5G technology allows for multiple connections to enhance speed and reliability."

This introduction of 5.5G marks a significant advance in mobile connectivity, reflecting ongoing technological progression in communication networks.

item.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra may disappoint S Pen fans - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Galaxy S25 Ultra May Disappoint S Pen Fans

Date: January 10, 2025

Source: Samsung Mobile News

With the upcoming release of the Galaxy S25 Ultra, reports suggest that the S Pen will lose some core features, disappointing many fans who enjoy its capabilities.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra S Pen may lose Bluetooth connectivity.
  • Air Actions and remote camera functionality may be removed as a result.
  • There is a slight chance that a different technology, such as UWB, may be adopted.
  • Samsung is set to announce the Galaxy S25 lineup on January 22.
"It seems more likely that Samsung may have decided to strip some features off the Galaxy S25 Ultra S Pen..."

Further details will be revealed at the upcoming announcement.

item.title: Gujarat Fluorochemicals announces incorporation of step-down subsidiary in Singapore - Business Standard
item.description:
Gujarat Fluorochemicals Forms New Subsidiary in Singapore

Date: Jan 10 2025 | Source: Capital Market - Live News

Gujarat Fluorochemicals has announced the incorporation of a new wholly owned subsidiary in Singapore, GFCL EV Products Pte., which was officially registered on January 7, 2025.

  • The subsidiary was incorporated as part of GFCL's strategic expansion efforts.
  • The Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority of Singapore issued a Certificate confirming the incorporation on January 9, 2025.

No Business Standard Journalist was involved in the creation of this content.

This development marks a significant step for Gujarat Fluorochemicals in expanding its international presence.

item.title: [CES 2025] Samsung Unveils a New Vision for Displays at First Look Event - Samsung Newsroom Malaysia
item.description:
Samsung Unveils a New Vision for Displays at First Look Event

Date: January 2025 Source: Samsung News

Samsung Electronics highlighted its technological leadership through a showcase of innovative products ahead of CES 2025, introducing Vision AI to enhance user experiences with personalized AI features.

  • Introduction of Vision AI for personalized screens.
  • Showcase of Generative Wallpaper technology that customizes digital displays.
  • Display innovations including HoloDisplay and MICRO LED Beauty Mirror.
  • Next-generation screens focus on lifestyle integration and aesthetic appeal.
  • Interactive experiences with innovative features like Live Translate and Click to Search.
“Samsung continues to pave the way for smarter, more convenient lifestyles.”

The event showcased Samsung’s direction towards integrating AI in display technologies, signifying a major step towards personalized user experiences in homes.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price leaked, phones could cost more this time - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price leaked, phones could cost more this time

Published on: Jan 10, 2025 by: Nandini Yadav

Samsung is scheduled to host the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, showcasing the new Galaxy S25 series, with leaked pricing information surfacing ahead of the official announcement.

Key Points:

  • The Galaxy S25 series will include the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, with rumors of an S25 Slim variant.
  • Pricing for the Galaxy S25 starts at 964 euros (~Rs 85,000) for the 128GB model, with higher capacities costing more.
  • The Galaxy S25+ is expected to start at 1,235 euros (~Rs 1,09,000), while the S25 Ultra could start at 1,557 euros (~Rs 1,38,000).
  • Colour options include icy blue, mint, navy, silver, and more premium shades for the Ultra variant.
  • Pre-reservations in India have begun, allowing customers to customize their orders and receive exclusive offers.

Notable Quotes:

“Pre-reservations in India have started for Rs 1,999, offering early access and benefits worth Rs 5,000.”

As the release date approaches, consumers are eager to see how the new models will compete in the high-end smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung’s new Battery Icon in One UI 7 may be tweaked in future - Sammy Fans
item.description:
Samsung's One UI 7 Battery Icon May See Future Tweaks

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung has introduced a new design for the battery icon in One UI 7, which may continue to evolve based on user feedback.

  • The One UI 7 Beta 3 update features a bulkier, more balanced battery icon.
  • The shape has been modified to have rounded corners and a more heightened appearance.
  • Feedback from users reflects mixed feelings about the new design, with some calling for further changes.
  • A Samsung moderator confirmed that all suggestions would be considered for future updates.
  • Samsung is reportedly preparing a stable version of One UI 7 for the upcoming Galaxy S24 series.
“Samsung appreciates hearing different ideas and that all suggestions will be passed on.”

As Samsung strives to enhance its One UI experience, the timeline for those updates remains uncertain.
